data.comment: Today's referee, Bastian Dankert, has blown to start the match.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Bastian Dankert waits before resuming play because Benjamin Stambouli for Schalke is still down.
Schalke's Benjamin Stambouli is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 5, Nassim Boujellab gets his shot on target but fails to score for Schalke.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 6, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Schalke.
Bastian Dankert signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Schalke.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 10, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke just outside Bielefeld's area.
At VELTINS-Arena, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Bielefeld close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Manuel Prietl for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bastian Dankert awards Schalke a goal kick.
Ozan Kabak is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 15, Schalke make their first substitution with Malick Thiaw replacing Omar Mascarell.
Bielefeld are caught offside.
Schalke's Ozan Kabak looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 17, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 18, Schalke's Alessandro Schopf gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In Gelsenkirchen Bielefeld attack through Christian Gebauer. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 20, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
Schalke pushes forward through Benito Raman, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 23, Schalke's Suat Serdar breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gelsenkirchen.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 25, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a Schalke throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
In the minute 26, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Bastian Oczipka (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Bastian Dankert.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 28, Free kick Bielefeld.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Bielefeld drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Manuel Prietl for Bielefeld has been booked by Bastian Dankert and receives a first yellow card.
Schalke advance rapidly upfield but Bastian Dankert blows for offside.
In the minute 32, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Schalke's Nassim Boujellab gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 33, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 36, Bastian Dankert awards Schalke a goal kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a Schalke throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Bielefeld needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 39, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Christian Gebauer for Bielefeld drives towards goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 40, Schalke have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld apply pressure at VELTINS-Arena and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Sergio Cordova but the strike hits the bar!
Schalke have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At VELTINS-Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 45, Mike Van der Hoorn (Bielefeld) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Schalke defenders.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Schalke drives forward and Nassim Boujellab gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 50, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a Schalke throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
In the minute 53, Bielefeld's Fabian Klos scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Nathan De Medina instrumental with a fine assist.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, At VELTINS-Arena, Amos Pieper has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Nassim Boujellab with Amine Harit.
Schalke surge into the attack at VELTINS-Arena but Salif Sane’s header is off-target.
In the minute 56, Bastian Dankert awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Bielefeld.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 57, Schalke's Suat Serdar has been booked in Gelsenkirchen.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hamza Mendyl (Schalke) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Bielefeld at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 64, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 66, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke.
Cedric Brunner for Bielefeld has been booked by Bastian Dankert and receives a first yellow card.
Schalke are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Steven Skrzybski is on a sub for Hamza Mendyl for Schalke.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Alessandro Schopf with Ahmed Kutucu. This is the fourth substitution made today by Huub Stevens.
Bielefeld are coming forward and Sergio Cordova gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Sven Schipplock is replacing Fabian Klos for the away team.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 74, Schalke to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
At VELTINS-Arena, Sven Schipplock has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Attention is being given to Schalke’s Salif Sane and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 76, Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Salif Sane for Schalke is back on the field again.
Bastian Dankert awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Cedric Brunner with Cebio Soukou.
In the minute 81, Fabian Kunze is replacing Marcel Hartel for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, In Gelsenkirchen, Ahmed Kutucu of Schalke is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Amine Harit (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Bastian Dankert.
Free kick Bielefeld.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, Bielefeld's Ritsu Doan has been booked in Gelsenkirchen.
The match at VELTINS-Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sergio Cordova, who is down injured.
In the minute 88, Uwe Neuhaus (Bielefeld) is making a fourth substitution, with Nils Seufert replacing Sergio Cordova.
Can Bielefeld capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Bielefeld are in shooting range from this free kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Bielefeld.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Schalke's Benito Raman has been booked in Gelsenkirchen.
